problem.markdown:
>>In the model solution provided the field start command is ----- to start the process.<< ( ) Not important ( ) Optional (x) Mandatory
[explanation] Give Explanation [explanation]
>>The operation of lifting bottle platform and opening of coarse solenoid valve :<< ( ) Must be Simultaneous ( ) Coarse valve must open first (x) Solenoid valve should open after delay
[explanation] Give Explanation [explanation]
>>To display no of bottles filled ----- function block is used<< ( ) OND (x) CTR ( ) Both
[explanation] Give Explanation [explanation]
>>Number of Dos involved in this process<< ( ) 2 (x) 4 ( ) 6
[explanation] Give Explanation [explanation]
>>Number of DIs involved in this process<< (x) 3 ( ) 5 ( ) 7
[explanation] Give Explanation [explanation]
